title: Ranked Solo Que help
body: I just finished a ranked game at 1:35 PM Nov 16th while being in my G2 promos with one win, i won the game and should have been promoted to G2 however i did not? My ranked standings are the same and the server also acted up for me not allowing me to login after i restarted the client. Is this just some poor timing for me and the server? How do i go about getting my win and my promotion? Please help me rito!

replies.body: I won my last game in my series to silver 4 but the servers didn't pick it up.

Hey there, I looked into this for you but didn't see anything out of the ordinary.  The series ended with 1 win and 2 losses.  Your most recent match with Kayn a win, though, and got you back into a new series.  Let me know if that clears things up.
Hi could you check the stats for me please? my recently 2 matches won but im now on 21lp. I didn't get lp for my last game.Thank you.
Hey there, it looks like you had a loss with Sona (1/8/3) in between those two wins.

It made me confused because the match history shown on my page is Victory-Victory-Defeat-Victory. Is my last game not be recorded? but i can saw it on my page.Thanks for checking though.
I think lots of people met the issue like me. I post a screenshot link below.[](https://imgur.com/a/mNcGm)

Aha!  I've seen similar reports, and it sounds like the servers weren't picking up end of match details during today's server issues.  I've forwarded the report to interested parties, but I can't guarantee if the stats will be picked up.
All good! Appreciate for double checking!

Ah, i that makes sense and it's what i saw as well, I guess I had already mentally convinced myself other wise when it all happened and the servers being odd raised my suspicion. Thank you though for double checking for me Porocles, thought I may be going insane! :D
Ranked makes me go insane in general, so I'm happy to help.  {{sticker:katarina-love}}
This happened to me in my B2, i was supposed to be in my Promos right now.
I hope you get the help you need
